Sober Tracker: Your Personal Sobriety Companion

Track your sobriety journey with privacy and support. This simple yet powerful Chrome extension helps you monitor your progress, celebrate milestones, and stay motivated on your path to recovery.

‚ú® Privacy-First: All data stays on your device
üéØ Streak Tracking: Monitor your daily progress
üèÜ Milestone Celebrations: Celebrate your achievements at 7, 30, and every 30 days
üìä Success Rate: Track your overall success rate
üåç Language Support: Available in English and Russian

Your Journey, Your Terms:
‚Ä¢ Start fresh whenever you need
‚Ä¢ Track multiple recovery attempts
‚Ä¢ Add notes and reasons for new chapters
‚Ä¢ Keep your longest streak across attempts
‚Ä¢ Supportive, non-judgmental approach

Privacy & Security:
‚Ä¢ No account required
‚Ä¢ No data sent to servers
‚Ä¢ Everything stays in your browser

This extension is designed with compassion and understanding, recognizing that recovery is a personal journey with its own timeline. Whether you're just starting out or continuing your path, Sober Tracker is here to support you every step of the way.
